long_title: A Randomized, Open-label, Phase 3 Study of Sacituzumab Govitecan Versus Treatment of Physician's Choice in Patients With Hormone Receptor-Positive (HR+)/Human Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor 2 Negative (HER2−) (HER2 IHC0 or HER2-low [IHC 1+, IHC 2+/ISH−]) Inoperable, Locally Advanced, or Metastatic Breast Cancer and Have Received Endocrine Therapy (Ascent-07)
prior_treatment_requirements: HR+/HER2- advanced breast cancer eligible for first chemotherapy
No prior use of topoisomerase I inhibitor
- Progressive disease (PD) on ≥2 previous lines of endocrine therapy (ET) in metastatic setting
- PD within 6 months of first-line ET in metastatic setting
- PD within 24 months of adjuvant ET + CDK 4/6 inhibitor and not a candidate for further ET
short_title: Study of Sacituzumab Govitecan Versus Treatment of Physician's Choice in Patients With Hormone Receptor-Positive (HR+)/Human Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor 2 Negative (HER2−) Breast Cancer
